alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 3:20PM MDT until June 06 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Lincoln County in central New Mexico... * Until 415 PM MDT. * At 320 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles east of Jicarilla to 6 miles west of Encinoso, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Encinoso and Jicarilla. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
